title: Average ticket price Boston Celtics ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015/16 to 2012/13.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2011/12 to 2008/09.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008/09 to 2006/07.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2012/13 to 2011/12.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Boston Celtics games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16 . In the 2006/07 season , the average ticket price was 57.04 U.S. dollars . Boston Celtics The Boston Celtics are a professional basketball team of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) playing in the Eastern Conference of the league .
